articles.title: The first language model for chemistry
articles.description:
RXN is based on molecular transformer models that understand the natural language of chemistry, trained on over 3 million chemical reactions. Scientists can upload molecules to the cloud to determine reactions and ingredients.

 Results are accurate and fast, at a rate of ~7ms/reaction. Huge data sets containing millions of reactions can be mapped within a few hours.
